name: [GGJ2023] Constellation
description:
Please Maximize To Play! Control: Mouse Left Button Click: Shoot Hook Mouse Left Button Hold: Shrink Rope Mouse Right Button Click: Cut Rope Space: Push To Mouse Direction

This is a 2D top-down hook game. The player is an astronaut lost in space. Player needs to use the hook-and-cable and jet knapsack to move through the complex meteorite area and find a way to the giant space station. There are many small space capsules in the scene. When exploring, player can reactivate the small space capsule and obtain supplies. The reactivated modules will be connected to each other, and the connected modules will form a nebula unique to the player. 

Team Member: 

Programmer - Qikun Xu 

Designer - Jin Zhou, Tianzuo Peng, Yichun He 

Artist - Yuxin Yan 

Credit: Unity Asset Store - Warped Shooting Fx By Ansimuz 6＆9 - Cornfield Chase（Piano Concerto Ver)
